title: Connections
description: Manage your network of agents and collaborators

yourConnections.title: Your Connections
yourConnections.description: Agents you're connected with. Share properties, clients, and collaborate on deals.

pendingRequests.title: Pending Requests
pendingRequests.description: Connection requests waiting for your response

sentRequests.title: Sent Requests
sentRequests.description: Connection requests you've sent that are awaiting response

search.title: Find Agents
search.description: Search for agents to connect with and expand your network
search.noResults: No agents found matching your search.
search.emptyPrompt: Search for agents to connect with.

connectionsList.empty: You don't have any connections yet.
connectionsList.emptyHint: Find agents to connect with using the "Find Agents" tab.
connectionsList.sentEmpty: You haven't sent any connection requests.

pendingList.emptyHint: When someone sends you a connection request, it will appear here.

toast.requestCancelledDesc: Your connection request has been cancelled.
toast.connectionRemovedDesc: You are no longer connected with this agent.
toast.connectionAcceptedDesc: You are now connected! You can share properties and collaborate.
toast.requestDeclinedDesc: The connection request has been declined.
toast.requestSentDesc: Your connection request has been sent.
